pageContent: Aim: of the study: demonstrate the feasibility of non-invasive mechanical disintegration of human prostate tissue using pulsed high-intensity focused ultrasound (pHIFU), a method termed boiling histotripsy.

metaData.source:
Histotripsy methods in mechanical disintegration of tissue: towards clinical applications
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25707817/
